directions: In medium bowl beat cream cheese until light and fluffy.
Slowly add sweetened condensed milk, beating until smooth. Stir in lemon juice and vanilla until mixed well.
Pour into crust. Chill 6 to 8 hours or until firm and then top with LUCKY LEAF Premium Strawberry Pie Filling, or cut pieces and spoon pie filling over each slice.
ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can LUCKY LEAF® Premium Strawberry Fruit Filling
title: Strawberry Cream Cheese Passion Pie
